data.text: @katypearce Understandable. I’d be happy to do an intro webinar etc for any of the classes too. Plus we have monthly office hours that students can sign up for for 1:1 support and a course that helps students learn how to get started with the new academic product track using Python or R https://t.co/6xTDiwfZTI
